description: Damian was Charmander`s original owner. He abandoned it believing Charmander was too weak to be on his team of Pok√©mon. Upon seeing how strong Charmander was after fighting off Team Rocket, Damian requested for it to rejoin him, but Charmander ultimately decided to stick with Ash after he, Misty, and Brock took care of it during a storm.
name: Daisuke
